title: Portfolio
details: My portfolio: Responsive site built with React and Sass with interactive animations, designed and coded without templates, to showcase my work

title: Ace the Interview!
details: Ace the Interview! is for job seekers who want to practice their interview skills. Questions are randomly chosen and there are optional timers

title: Little Library
details: Little libraries is for keeping track of ‘Little Libraries’
stacks: React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Google Map API, Firebase, JWTs, React Router

title: Find Meow!
details: Find Me-ow! is an app to help to unite lost cats and found cats with their owners. Colloborated with two other collegues as final project at Lighthouse labs.

title: Scheduler
details: Interview Scheduler is a one page application built with React using Jest, Storybook, and Cypress for arranging interview schedules.
